modules.description: Processes input streams by lexing and parsing tokens into structured results. Accepts a lexer function to extract tokens from a buffer and a parser to convert tokens into a result type. Used to implement language processors that transform raw text into abstract syntax trees or similar structures.

Provides functions to simplify interaction with parsers generated by menhir or ocamlyacc, including error handling and input tracking. Works with parser states, input buffers, and token streams. Enables seamless integration of generated parsers with custom processing logic and error reporting.

Registers a pretty printer for parsing errors, enhancing error messages with color, source location, and code highlighting. Processes input strings, channels, or files, returning results structured around custom token and result types. Used to parse domain-specific languages with detailed error reporting, such as validating input in a custom grammar.
